attributes.action: Creation of reperations and compensation fund for any foreign war
attributes.additional_details:
Cost of living is rising, our services are stretch and we are fighting wars at the behest of other then dealing with the refugees crisis while other take minimum load. 

This given money for rebuild quickly keeping people there but also enable our services to ramp up for influx proactively rather then reactively.

If we don't have the money then we sit out
attributes.background: The UK to put in escrow 30 billion for post-war rebuild, additional £20k per family per person killed in affected countries. Commit an extra £20 billion to the refugeecare fund in Uk eg nhs. Money must be paid upfront apart from reparation for the dead must be paid within 1 year.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call for a clear action. You have explained you would like a reparations and compensation fund to be started, but we are unsure if you would like this to apply to all foreign wars, or only to certain wars (for example - where the UK is involved in a particular way).

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what you would like to happen.
